attributes.action: Prevent Primary Care Trust managers receiving  bonuses after poor performanace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition The Prime Minister, Gordon Brown to ensure that The Managers of Primary Care Trusts do not receive bonuses where the PCT they have had a steering hand in has underperformed, and that the present outbreaks of C.Difficile, MSRA,and other Hospital related illnesses do not show significant reductions.
